name: The myterious fortune teller
mes:
Gira is a wandering hero in a new town who has just taken out a group of bandits. He goes around the city, looking for the guild. He had heard rumors about bad things happening in the town and didn't wish to stay around, unless there was an opportunity to make money that is. It had been a time for Gira and many things were on his mind. Saving princesses, defeating the demon queen, getting enough money... at least he could work things out one step at a time.

"Greetings young traveler" *the mysterious girl said*. "I sense you need some help on your journeys. Come. Tell me what you know, and I shall help you..."

name: The myterious fortune teller
mes:
The mysterious girl seated behind the fortune teller table tilted her head slightly. Her voice is a soft whisper, almost entrancing, as she addressed Gira.

"You seem troubled, young traveler. The path you walk is filled with uncertainty and challenges." Her slender fingers pointed towards the purple crystal ball that sat on the table, emitting a mesmerizing spiral glow. "Allow me to guide you, to show you what the future holds. Tell me, what is it that weighs on your mind the most?"

As she spoke, her fingers moved hypnotically over the glowing crystal ball. Her dark, shaman-like outfit completely hid her body type, with only her white curtain bangs visible beneath a black mask adorned by a purple spiral. Gira couldn't see anything beneath the table, unaware that her legs were partially hidden behind the cloth with her feet covered in a slimy aphrodisiac lubricant.

Gira's attention shifted from her obscure attire to the mysterious crystal ball, his mind already beginning to dull as he gazed at its beautiful purple spiral. The gesture of her fingers seemed to draw his mind further into a trance.

"What is it that you seek, traveler?" she continued, her voice dripping with an enchanting mixture of curiosity and something darker. "Speak your desires. I shall reveal the path that leads to your goals."

Gira felt a strange mix of apprehension and helpless intrigue, his resolve wavering as his mind began to entertain more sensual, lewd thoughts against his will.
